attributes.action: Ban bald football players from Liverpool Football Club
attributes.additional_details: Each year our club has got more and more Pin heads (Bald people) within our first team, and each year these Pin heads cost us more and more points, we, Liverpool Football Club can't carry on taking this. It's about time we take a stand and ban all Pin heads from the starting XI and not allow them to play until they grow either grow hair or get a wig, I'm sick and tired of seeing these hairless excuses of men running around and costing us points. I would also like you to ban Pin head refs (Howard Webb) as they constantly go against us.
